title: rateMovie
motton: A minified version of IMDB - rating
features: Users can create two types of account. those are eaither fan or admin
fans can search for movies and filter their search by their category & get to know details about the movies they click
users can add review/comment to any of the movies with stars as long as they are logged in.
Users can also like and unlike reiews given by others users
fans can send message or text to admin from the contact page
admins can see the message sent through contact page and reply with an auto message and the specific fan will get notification of the reply
admins can manage other admin and fans from admin dashboard
admins can also manage, visit or delete any movies from admin dashboard
Admins can add new movie with all the information needed for a movie
Top-50 movies page has a table of top stared movies.

title: justBuy
features: implemented three (buyer, seller, admin) role
buyer can buy and add to wishlist the item they want and pay through stripe
Sellers can add seven types of branded phones and their details with image and advertise and recieve payment through stripe and can even delete their own items
Admin can manage all the buyers and sellers .
all of the data are being stored at mongo db
